recentLoginHeading1: If you notice any unusual activity you do not recognize:
recentLoginHeading2: to protect your account or contact customer care for additional help. For security of your account and client data, IDs and passwords cannot be shared and cannot be logged in from 2 locations or devices simultaneously.

LoginText1: Just getting started with Credit Repair Cloud?
chatcontent_txt3: Hi. Can you send me the missing invoices asap?
chhelloatcontent_txt1: Yes, I'll email them right now. I'll let you know once the remaining invoices are done.
how: How are you? Is it ok if I call you?
Hello: Hello, I just got my Amazon order shipped and I’m very happy about that.
Hurray: Hurray! There are no archived chats!
taskBannerText: Use this page to easily manage tasks for yourself and to deligate tasks to other team members within your company.
scheduleTooltipTitle: Choose daily, weekly or monthly view. Click below to create, update or delete events and appointments. Use drag and drop to move and reschedule.  Import or export to Outlook and Google Calendar.
passwordPatternInvalid: Must Contain minimum 8 Characters, One Uppercase, One Lowercase, One Number and One Special Case Character
areYouSureYouWantToDeleteThisTask: Are you sure you want to delete this task?
areYouSureYouWantToDeleteThisEvent: Are you sure to remove this event?
subject: Subject
newAndConfirmPasswordShouldBeTheSame: New password and confirm password should be the same
subjectAndTeamMemberRequried: Enter Subject and Select Team Member
deleteLeadText: Are you sure you want to delete this lead?
myCompanyProfilePageInstruction: Please fill in all the details on this page, so the appropriate details will appear for your clients and affiliates.
name/CompanyCliensInvoiceShouldPayableTo: Name/Company that your client invoices should be payable to
automatedNotificationsMyCompanyProfileTe: Automated notifications are sent from the account holder's name and email address. Or you may designate a different name (or a company name) and email below for all notifications sent.
addremoveormodifyext: Add, remove or modify the dispute reasons and instructions that appear as choices in the Dispute Wizard. Add as many as you like. The only ones you cannot delete or modify are the defaults.
MyCompanyTeamMemberPageInfoToAddNewTeamM: Click "Add New Team Member" to give login access to your co-workers and employees. Each team member must have their own unique User ID and Password. User ID's cannot be shared. Hold your mouse over a team member to display information or delete the Team Member. If you're a new user, be sure to click on your team member profile to enter all your contact details. You can resend login details from a team member's profile.
TeamMemberPageInfoYourAccountHasOwnerPar: Your account has one owner: the person who signed our user agreement. The account owner cannot change, as that is who has created this account, but if you would like to set a different name and email for all automated notifications sent from your company, visit

The account owner's name and User ID cannot be modified or deleted, and no other person may request changes to the account. If you need to contact us, always write from the same email address you signed up with. This is for safety and security of the data we store.
TeamMenberPageInfoAccountWarning: Warning: Never share your login details with any other person, especially when you are the account holder.
AddTeamMemberInfoText: Each team member must have their own unique email address for messages sent to clients, affiliates and team members. Email addresses can be changed by a user with admin permissions. What a team member can see and do depends upon the role you assign them. For more information visit
thisWillBeUsedTeamMemberUserID: This will be used as team member’s User ID
pleaseFillAllrequriedFields: Please fill out all required fields
AreYouSureWantDeleteTeamMember: Are you sure you want to delete this team member?
